DOC.brief_summary: This study examine relationship self-compassion wellbeing new mother whether online self-help course new mother help improve wellbeing self-compassion .
DOC.brief_title: The Development Initial Evaluation Web-based , Compassion-focussed Course New Mothers
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomise control trial ( RCT ) compare online self-help course ( 'Kindness Mums ' ) wait-list control . A battery self-report measure administer online baseline ( week 0 ) , post-intervention ( week 6 ) follow-up ( week 12 ) . Baseline data also use examine relationship self-compassion wellbeing .
DOC.criteria: New mother ( biological , adoptive fulltime foster mother ) Able complete baseline measure infant age 012 month Fluent English Live United Kingdom Able access internet Experiencing suicidal ideation time enrolment
